meanings.definition: Ontologists: Those who study the nature of being.
meanings.sent1: Ontologists enjoy exploring the essence of existence.
meanings.sent2: Many ontologists dedicate their time to understanding being.
meanings.sent3: The ontologists had a lively debate about the meaning of life.
meanings.sent4: In the realm of philosophy, ontologists are like detectives of existence.
meanings.sent5: The conference room was filled with curious ontologists eager to discuss ontology.

meanings.definition: Ontologists: Individuals who specialize in ontology.
meanings.sent1: She became an ontologist to focus on the study of ontology.
meanings.sent2: Ontologists often delve deep into the intricacies of ontology.
meanings.sent3: The ontologists' convention was a gathering of brilliant minds.
meanings.sent4: To the uninitiated, ontologists may seem like wizards of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The library was a treasure trove for aspiring ontologists seeking wisdom.
